name: ARConfiguration.FrameSemantics
desc: Types of optional frame features you can enable in your app.

items.name: static var bodyDetection: ARConfiguration.FrameSemantics
items.desc: An option that indicates that 2D body detection is enabled.

items.name: static var personSegmentation: ARConfiguration.FrameSemantics
items.desc: An option that indicates that people occlude your app's virtual content.

items.name: static var personSegmentationWithDepth: ARConfiguration.FrameSemantics
items.desc: An option that indicates that people occlude your app's virtual content depending on depth.

items.name: static var sceneDepth: ARConfiguration.FrameSemantics
items.desc: An option that provides the distance from the device to real-world objects viewed through the camera.

items.name: static var smoothedSceneDepth: ARConfiguration.FrameSemantics
items.desc: An option that provides the distance from the device to real-world objects, averaged across several frames.
